content: X-IE-GS Insulation Fastener Insulation fasteners pre-mounted with high-performance knurled nails for fixing mineral wool, XPS, PIR and PUR boards through sheathing into cold-formed steel studs ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster and more reliable installation to steel stud framing One-step installation with no additional sealing cap required Sets to the right depth, helping to prevent overdrive and damage to the foil-facing insulation Applications Cold formed steel stud framing (18-12 Gauge) Continuous rigid board insulation over gypsum sheathing Continuous mineral wool insulation over gypsum sheathing For use in 1/2 to 5/8 thick sheathing ### TECHNICAL DATA: Insulation material: Hard board (e.g. XPS, PUR, PIR), Soft board (e.g. EPS), Mineral wool Base materials: Steel For use with (tools): GX-IE Technical Data | Application | Rigid Board Insulation, Mineral Wool Insulation | Insulation material | Hard board (e.g. XPS, PUR, PIR), Soft board (e.g. EPS), Mineral wool | Base materials | Steel | For use with (tools) | GX-IE | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 1 mm | Material | High-density polyethylene (HDPE) | Color | Grey ### ITEMS- 2299884 -
